name: Paizo whitespace Superstar
description: Do Paizo messageboards avatar titles like "RPG Superstar 2015 Top 16, RPG Superstar 2013 Top 32, RPG Superstar 2012 Top 16 , Dedicated Voter 2013, Star Voter 2014, Star Voter 2015" make you scroll your browser horizontally just to read posts? Install this style!
